title: Sanctioned parliamentarians warn Starmer against deal with China
description: The group of sanctioned MPs and peers said they should not be used as a bargaining chip to ease restrictions on Chinese officials., The group of sanctioned MPs and peers said they should not be used as a bargaining chip to ease restrictions on Chinese officials.
content:
# Sanctioned parliamentarians warn Starmer against deal with China

13 hrs ago

By PA News Agency

Share

[0 comments](https://www.leaderlive.co.uk/comments/25810671/)

Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer had talks with President Xi Jinping of China (Carl Court/PA)
